abstract: Debra Lobo, American citizen, is critically wounded in apparent militant attack in Pakistan; Daulah al-Islamiyyah claims responsibility for attack.
lead_paragraph: The victim, Debra Lobo, a longtime resident of Karachi who works at a medical school, was shot while driving, and leaflets at the scene suggested a militant attack.

headline.main: American Woman Wounded in Shooting in Karachi, Pakistan
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; Pakistan: American Wounded in Karachi Shooting

snippet: The victim, Debra Lobo, a longtime resident of Karachi who works at a medical school, was shot while driving, and leaflets at the scene suggested a militant attack.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
